name: It's Full of Stars!
description:
=======

​“It really is very good, comfortably sits with the highest end games in terms of attention to detail. It's just a satisfying thing.” - Keith

“Looks marvelous! Love the mix of cartoons, 50's alien B-movies and hi-tech plasma effects.” - Darren

“To be honest the music is a bit too good; I leave it on the title screen on purpose for a while…” - Keith

"On the iPad it looks bloody fantastic, seriously impressed with how clean it all looks" - Chris

“I swear you’ve created the dark souls of space thrusting based games though, my god there’s some brutal difficulty in these later levels“ - Chris

“This might be the best mobile game of 2018.” - Someone on the internet
